def diff(arr, n: int, axis: int = 0):
    import numpy as np
    """
    difference of n between self,
    analogous to s-s.shift(n)
    
    Parameters
    ----------
    arr : ndarray
        input array
    n : int
        number of periods
    axis : int
        axis to shift on
    
    Returns
    -------
    shifted : ndarray
        the shifted array
    """
    
    na = np.nan
    dtype = arr.dtype
    
    is_timedelta = False
    if np.issubdtype(arr.dtype, np.datetime64) or np.issubdtype(arr.dtype, np.timedelta64):
        dtype = np.float64
        arr = arr.astype('float64', copy=True)
        na = iNaT
        is_timedelta = True
    elif np.issubdtype(arr.dtype, np.bool_):
        dtype = np.object_
    elif np.issubdtype(arr.dtype, np.integer):
        dtype = np.float64
    
    out_arr = np.empty(arr.shape, dtype=dtype)
    
    na_indexer = [slice(None)] * arr.ndim
    na_indexer[axis] = slice(None, n) if n >= 0 else slice(n, None)
    out_arr[tuple(na_indexer)] = na
    
    if arr.ndim == 1 and np.issubdtype(arr.dtype, np.bool_):
        out_arr[axis] = arr ^ np.roll(arr, -n)
    
    else:
        res_indexer = [slice(None)] * arr.ndim
        res_indexer[axis] = slice(n, None) if n >= 0 else slice(None, n)
        lag_indexer = [slice(None)] * arr.ndim
        lag_indexer[axis] = slice(None, -n) if n > 0 else slice(-n, None)
    
        result = arr[res_indexer] - arr[lag_indexer]
    
        mask = (arr[res_indexer] == na) | (arr[lag_indexer] == na)
        result[mask] = na
    
        out_arr[res_indexer] = result
    
    if is_timedelta:
        out_arr = out_arr.astype('timedelta64[ns]')
    
    return out_arr
